about.ip: Gloomhaven and all related properties, images and text are owned by {0}.

campaignManagement.hint: Changing current campaign or creation of new campaign is disabled during a scenario. Finish or cancel current scenario to change current campaign or create a new campaign.
campaignManagement.name: Name for Campaign {0}

progress.donations: Donations to Sanctuary of the Great Oak: {0}
progress.lock: Lock the character sheet to avoid accidental edits.
progress.name: Name

retirement.events: Add City Event {0} and Road Event {0} to the deck

auto.countHint: Number of actions between automatic backups

error.status: Automatic Backup failed with response code '{0}'. Take a look at the browser console for more details.
error.unknown: Automatic Backup failed due to unknown reason. Please take a look at the browser console for more details.

uploadUrl.hint: Instead of downloading the automatic backup file, set an URL to upload the data to. {FILENAME} can be used as placeholder for filename.  (This requires proper CORS settings to work!)

uploadUrlAuthorization.hint: Used as the 'Authorization' header for upload request

uploadUrlFileUpload.hint: Create a file object to upload. If unchecked, raw JSON string data will be send.

Back up your game regularly to prevent data loss.
hint.text: Your entire process is stored in your browser's storage. Although no browser should accidentally delete this data, there are still very few reports of such incidents. Regardless of whether these incidents are caused by errors in use, but to be on the safe side, it is a good idea to create a backup.

download.onFinish: Automatic backup after finishing a scenario

gameClock.clockIn: Clock in to the Game Clock
gameClock.clockOut: Clock out from the Game Clock
gameClock.off: Game Clock paused! Doubleclick to clock in.
gameClock.paused:
Game Clock paused! Doubleclick to clock in.
Total: {0}
gameClock.running:
Game Clock running! Doubleclick to clock out.
Current: {1}
gameClock.runningTotal:
Game Clock running! Doubleclick to clock out.
Current: {1}
Total: {0}

json.download: Download Character Data as JSON file
Download Abilities Deck as JSON file
Download Edition Data as JSON file
Download Monster Stats as JSON file

effects.recoverRandomDiscard: Recover %game.card.recover% one random card from your discard pile

shuffle.upcomingHint: Doubleclick to shuffle only upcoming cards!

bane.hint: %game.conditionIcon.bane% Bane: Suffer %game.damage:10% at end of next turn, then remove. Also remove when healed.

bless.hint: %game.conditionIcon.bless% Bless: Shuffle %game.attackmodifier.bless% card into attack modifier deck

brittle.hint: %game.conditionIcon.brittle% Brittle: Double next source of %game.damage%, then remove. Also remove when healed.

chill.hint: %game.conditionIcon.chill% Chill: Gain -1 on all move and attacks for each token. Remove one at end of next turn.

curse.hint: %game.conditionIcon.curse% Curse: Shuffle %game.attackmodifier.curse% card into attack modifier deck

disarm.hint: %game.conditionIcon.disarm% Disarm: Cannot attack. Remove at end of next turn.

dodge.hint: %game.conditionIcon.dodge% Dodge: Discard or lose a card to prevent an attack, then remove.

empower.hint: %game.conditionIcon.empower% Empower: Shuffle %game.attackmodifier.empower% card into attack modifier deck.

enfeeble.hint: %game.conditionIcon.enfeeble% Enfeeble: Shuffle %game.attackmodifier.enfeeble% card into attack modifier deck.

immobilize.hint: %game.conditionIcon.immobilize% Immobilize: Cannot move. Remove at end of next turn.

impair.hint: %game.conditionIcon.impair% Impair: Cannot use items. Remove at end of next turn.

infect.hint: %game.conditionIcon.infect% Infect: Cannot gain shield. Remove when healed.

invisible.hint: %game.conditionIcon.invisible% Invisible: Cannot be targeted. Remove at end of next turn.

muddle.hint: %game.conditionIcon.muddle% Muddle: Disadvantage on all attacks. Remove at end of next turn.

poison.hint: %game.conditionIcon.poison% Poison: All attackers gain +1 %game.action.attack%. Prevents healing. Remove when healed.

poison_x.hint: %game.conditionIcon.poison_x:X% Poison X: All attackers gain +X %game.action.attack%. Prevents healing. Remove when healed.

regenerate.hint: %game.conditionIcon.regenerate% Regenerate: %game.action.heal% 1 at start of turn. Removed when damaged.

rupture.hint: %game.conditionIcon.rupture% Rupture: On move suffer %game.damage:1%. Remove when healed.

strengthen.hint: %game.conditionIcon.strengthen% Strengthen: Advantage on all attacks. Remove at end of next turn.

stun.hint: %game.conditionIcon.stun% Stun: Cannot perform abilities or use or trigger items. Remove at end of next turn.

ward.hint: %game.conditionIcon.ward% Ward: Halve (round down) next source of %game.damage%, then remove.

wound.hint: %game.conditionIcon.wound% Wound: Suffer %game.damage:1% at start of each turn. Remove when healed.

wound_x.hint: %game.conditionIcon.wound_x:X% Wound X: Suffer %game.damage:X% at start of each turn. Remove when healed.

math.maxCeil: (rounded up), up to a maximum of %game.number.{0}%
math.maxFloor: (rounded down), up to a maximum of %game.number.{0}%

deck.hint: No Ability Deck found for %{0}% '%data.{0}.{1}%'! Please check deck data (Edition: %data.edition.{2}%).

monsterEdition.hint: No Monster '%data.{0}.{1}%' found for edition '%data.edition.{2}%' (Edition '%data.edition.{3}%' used instead)! Please check monster data for edition: %data.edition.{2}%.

monsterType.hint: Current Monster Type {3} not found for '%data.{0}.{1}%'! Please check monster data (Edition: %data.edition.{2}%).

stat.hint: Stats for {3} level {4} missing for %{0}% '%data.{0}.{1}%'! Please check figure data (Edition: %data.edition.{2}%).

unknown.hint: No data found for %{0}% '%data.{0}.{1}%'! Please check edition data (Edition: %data.edition.{2}%).

brewing.noChar: Potion already owned by every character!

items.effect: If the item is equipped, it's effect is automatically applied. To equip an item, just click it's name. Equipping items is only allowed before and between scenarios. Double-click to force equipping.

event.city: add City Event {0} to the deck
event.rift: add Rift Event {0} to the deck
event.road: add Road Event {0} to the deck

specialTarget.enemiesMovedThroughAdjacent:
%game.target% all enemies occupying or adjacent to
hexes entered during the move ability

summon.player2-3: %game.monsterType.{0}% for two or three characters or %game.monsterType.{1}% for four characters
summon.player3-4: %game.monsterType.{0}% for two or %game.monsterType.{1}% for three or four characters

hints.active-full: Take turns, click each figure image
hints.addMonsterEntities: Use the "+" buttons to spawn monsters.
hints.draw-full: Choose character ability cards, set initiative, click "%round.draw%".

campaign.donations: Donations to Sanctuary of the Great Oak

rewards.items: Add %game.itemFh.{0}% to %game.itemFh.{1}% to the item supply

weekSections.hint: Double-click to set/edit sections for week
weekSections.lock: Lock the calendar to avoid accidental edits. Doubleclick to make a permissive lock, allowing to add or remove exactly one week.

new.hint: Creation of new campaign is disabled during a scenario. Finish or cancel current scenario to create a new campaign.

all.hint: Can also create new Permissions! Cannot be changed afterwards!

attackModifiers.hint: Draw and edit Monster and Ally Attack Modifier Deck

characters.hint: Update and change all characters and objectives.

monsters.hint: Update and change all monsters and monster entities

party.hint: Update and change Party and Campaign progress

round.hint: Control rounds and turns of figures

hint.active: Not all figures are done yet. End round anyway?
hint.battleGoals: Not all characters chose a Battle Goal. Start round anyway?
hint.empty: Please add monsters and characters before round.
hint.failed: All characters seems exhausted. Do you want to restart the scenario?
hint.finish: There are no monsters left. Did you successfully finish the scenario?
hint.missingInitiative: Initiative must be set for all figures!.

addWeek.next: Automatic pass calendar time to week {0}

add.next: Add %data.section:{0}% to the calendar in the %numbered.{1}% week of next %party.campaign.sheet.{2}%.

rewards.chooseItem: Choose to gain one of the following
rewards.chooseLocation: Choose to unlock only one of the following

event.boat: Add event {0} to the boat deck
event.city: Add City Event {0} to the deck
event.rift: Add Rift Event {0} to the deck
event.road: Add Road Event {0} to the deck
event.summer-outpost: Add event {0} to the summer outpost deck
event.summer-road: Add event {0} to the summer road deck
event.winter-outpost: Add event {0} to the winter outpost deck
event.winter-road: Add event {0} to the winter road deck

rewards.itemBlueprintRange: Add items %game.itemFh.{0}% to %game.itemFh.{1}% to the available item supply.
rewards.lootDeckCard: Add loot card {0} to every scenario loot deck in addition to the normal loot distribution.
rewards.overlayCampaignSticker: Place "%data.campaignSticker.{0}%" campaign sticker on the town map at location {1}
rewards.overlaySticker: Place map overlay sticker {0} on map in location {0} ({1}).
rewards.randomItems: Each character gains one random item ({0}-{1})
rewards.randomItemBlueprints: Add items %game.itemFh.{0}% to %game.itemFh.{1}% to the random item blueprint deck.

removeEvent.boat: Remove event {0} from the boat deck
removeEvent.city: Remove City Event {0} from the deck
removeEvent.rift: Remove Rift Event {0} from the deck
removeEvent.road: Remove Road Event {0} from the deck
removeEvent.summer-outpost: Remove event {0} from the summer outpost deck
removeEvent.summer-road: Remove event {0} from the summer road deck
removeEvent.winter-outpost: Remove event {0} from the winter outpost deck
removeEvent.winter-road: Remove event {0} from the winter road deck

rewards.removeLootDeckCard: Remove loot card {0} from the game. No longer add it to any scenario's loot deck.
rewards.townGuardAm: Add one %game.townGuardAm.{1}:{0}% card to the town guard deck.

figures.discardAbilityToBottom: Place ability on the bottom of the discard pile for {0}
figures.setAbility: Set active ability card of {0} to '{1}'

Add {0} random cards from the random monster card deck.
monster.cards: Add {0} random cards from the random monster card deck. Only use cards:{1}.

Draw {0} random cards from the random dungeon card deck. (manual)
dungeon.cards: Draw {0} random cards from the random dungeon card deck. Only use cards:{1}. (manual)

alreadyWarning.hint: The scenario was already finished successfully in campaign mode, no rewards are granted.

casualWarning.hintFh: In Frosthaven casual mode , all campaign effects are ignored. No event is resolved, time does not pass, and the party does not gain any experience, loot, treasures, checkmarks, personal quest progress, rewards, unlockables, etc

conclusionWarning.hint: It seems that this scenario is finished without a conclusion. This may lead to missing rewards and unlocks. Conclusion sections are marked with a icon.

server.blocked: Since you are not connected to your configured server, game updates are currently prevented.

connectionTries.hint: It does not appear that a successful connection can be established. You may check your network connection or your connection configuration.

server.forceHint: Attention: Local changes are discarded after a reconnect!

code.hint:
The Game Code identifies your game. For a new game just enter a new code of your choice or generate one. Everyone with the same Code connect to the same game.

This was previously called "Password", but to avoid confusion it is renamed now.

settings.hint: Synchronize besides the game also the settings for all clients using this option. Certainly, not all settings will be synced, like some options for visuals or the interface.

abilities.hint: Draw ability cards for monsters. If unchecked, the order of monsters must be set manually with drag&drop.

abilityNumbers.hint: Show the card number on ability cards

abilityReveal.hint: If unchecked, monster abilities are not revealed until turn

Do not ask for confirmation and apply those conditions automatically.

Enable this with care!
hint.brittle:
On suffering damage, automatic apply %game.condition.brittle% and increase damage.

Does not work automatically on %game.condition.poison%!
hint.heal: When increasing hitpoints automatic apply %game.action.heal% and remove corresponding conditions.
hint.shield: On suffering damage, automatic apply %game.action.shield% and lower damage.
hint.ward:
On suffering damage, automatic apply %game.condition.ward% and lower damage.

Does not work automatically on %game.condition.poison%!

Certain conditions need confirmation to be applied, for example when decreasing HP with Poison confirm to lose 1 extra HP
hint.brittle: On suffering damage, ask to apply %game.condition.brittle% and increase damage.
hint.heal: No condition, but helper if %game.action.heal% should be applied when increasing hitpoints.
hint.poison: On suffering damage, ask to apply %game.action.attack% +1 from %game.condition.poison% (including %game.attackmodifier.double%).
hint.poison_x: On suffering damage, ask to apply %game.action.attack% +X from %game.condition.poison_x:X% (including %game.attackmodifier.double%).
hint.shield: No condition, but helper if %game.action.shield% should be applied when taking damage and lower damage.
hint.ward: On suffering damage, ask to apply %game.condition.ward% and lower damage.

activeStandees.hint: On monsters turn, every standee has an active state, double click on standee to mark as done

activeSummons.hint: At start of the characters turn, summons will be activated in its order, double click to toggle active state.

addAllMonsters.hint: This will automatically add all monsters appearing in the scenario. Please consider that this may spoiler unrevealed rooms/sections.

allyAttackModifierDeck.hint: Enable the Attack Modifier Deck for allies

Always Attack Modifier Deck for allies
alwaysAllyAttackModifierDeck.hint: Always show the Attack Modifier Deck for allies

alwaysHazardousTerrain.hint: Always apply Frosthaven rules for Hazardous Terrain calculation (Automatic enabled when playing Frosthaven)

alwaysFhAdvantage.hint: Always apply Frosthaven rules for drawing Attack Modifier with Advantage or Disadvantage (Automatic enabled when playing Frosthaven)

alwaysFhSolo.hint: Always apply Frosthaven rules for Solo level calculation (Automatic enabled when playing Frosthaven)

alwaysLootApplyDialog.hint: Always show dialog to select character on Loot Card drawn instead of using active character

alwaysLootDeck.hint: Show Loot Deck for every scenario (Automatic enabled when playing Frosthaven)

amAdvantage.hint: Add Advantage and Disadvantage buttons and keyboard shortcuts to Attack Modifier Decks.

amAdvantageHouseRule.hint: Instead of ignore rolling on second draw, also draw additional modifiers until non-rolling drawn.

animations.hint: Disable all animations to increase performance

applyBuildingRewards.hint: On building or upgrading a building, apply the corresponding bonuses and open section dialog if present.

Corresponding conditions are automatically applied before and after turn, for example when entity has Wound it will lose 1 HP on start of it's round
hint.bane: Automatic apply %game.condition.bane% damage at end of turn.
hint.regenerate: Automatic apply %game.condition.regenerate% at start of turn.
hint.wound: Automatic apply %game.condition.wound% damage at end of turn.
hint.wound_x: Automatic apply %game.condition.wound_x:X% damage at end of turn.

applyLongRest.hint: Automatically perform %game.action.heal% 2 on turn of character while long resting

applyLoot.hint: Automatically add Loot after card drawn to active/chosen character

applyLootRandomItem.hint: Automatically draw and equip a new random item on random item loot to active/chosen character

applyRetirement.hint: On retirement, open dialog to apply retirement bonuses. Retirement is performed by checking the personal quest on the character sheet.

autoscroll.hint: Automatic scroll to next active figure

automaticAttackModifierFullscreen.hint: Open Attack Modifier Deck (and also Loot Deck) in fullscreen mode when on small devices. (Disabled without Portrait-Mode Optimization)

automaticGameClock.hint: Automatically start and stop game clock when window openes or closes.

automaticGameClockFocus.hint: Also start and stop game clock automatically when window gain focus or loses focus.

automaticPassTime.hint: Automatic pass time by adding a week to the calendar after finishing a scenario. This also automatically adds effects of calendar sections in this week.

automaticStandeesDialog.hint: Automatically open standee number dialogs for all new standees.

automaticTheme.hint:
Adjust Theme and Frosthaven Style automatically on edition change. Also adjust Theme when toggling Frosthaven Style.
(Theme adjustment disabled on Modern Theme)

automaticUnlocking.hint: Automatically unlock characters from scenario rewards.

barsize.hint: Set size of header and footer

backupHint.hint: Show a backup reminder when no scenario is running.

battleGoals.hint: Enable drawing and selecting Battle Goals before first round of a scenario.

battleGoalsCharacter.hint: Always show the Battle Goals menu on character. This is enabled automatically if Character Attack Modifier Deck are disabled to still access the battle goal menu.

battleGoalsFh.hint: Always apply Frosthaven rules to draw three Battle Goals. (Automatic enabled when playing Frosthaven)

battleGoalsReminder.hint: Show a reminder before first round if not all characters has choosen their Battle Goal.

calculate.hint: Ability values are calculated with stats, so instead of Attack +1 Attack 4 is shown for an Attack value of 3 in the stats

calculateStats.hint: Default stats values are added to the ability value, for example a Range value is automatically added to the Attack ability

Add Shield and Retaliate to abilities
calculateShieldStats.hint: Default stats values of %game.action.shield% and %game.action.retaliate% are added to %game.action.shield% and %game.action.retaliate% actions on ability card, so full aggregated values are shown.

characterAttackModifierDeck.hint: Enable Attack Modifier Deck for Characters. To use perks the Character Sheet must be enabled.

characterAttackModifierAnimate.hint: Display a draw animation if an Attack Modifier is drawn from a closed Attack Modifier Deck of a character.

characterAttackModifierDeckPermanent.hint: Display Attack Modifier Deck permanent under Character.

characterAttackModifierDeckPermanentActi.hint: Automatically toggle permanent AM Deck for active Character.

characterCompact.hint: Display narrow character board. (currently not supported on modern theme)

characterHandSize.hint: Display the hand size and level on the character's board.

characterIdentities.hint: Toggle between character forms by clicking on the form character icon next to it's name.

characterIdentityHint.hint: Displays the current active form after character name.

characterItems.hint: Allows to manage state of items during a scenario.

characterItemsApply.hint: Apply all self-affecting actions like %game.action.heal%, conditions, summons etc. when using item.

characterItemsPermanentActive.hint: Automatically toggle permanent Items for active Character.

characterSheet.hint: Enable the Character Sheet. To open it, click on the big character icon on the right side.

characterSheetCompact.hint: Show more compact character sheets not using the original character sheet layout.

characterTraits.hint: Display the traits the character's board.

columns.hint: Enable column layout if zoom and space fits

columnsForce.hint: Always distribute the figures across all available columns.

combineInteractiveAbilities.hint: Perform Interactive Abilities for all standees at once.

damageHP.hint: Show damage dealed instead of hitpoints left

disableAnimations.hint: Disable all animations to increase performance

disableArtwork.hint: Disable artwork of monsters and characters

disableColumns.hint: Completely disable two-column layout regardless of zoom and space

disableDragFigures.hint: Disable drag'n'drop for the figure list. Warning, if no initiative is required, there is no way to re-order the figures manually.

disableSortFigures.hint: Disables the automatic sorting of figures. The order must be set manually via Drag'n'Drop.

disableStandees.hint: Do not display standees (when Hide stats is set, add normal and elite monster separate). This also disables unlocking rooms and automatic standees.

disabledTurnConfirmation.hint: Disables the reminder when clicking "%round.next%" before all figures finished their turns. If %settings.expireConditions% or %settings.applyConditions% is active it will be automatically applied for all figures.

disableWakeLock.hint: Disable Wake Lock on supported devices. Wake Lock will keep the screen on. This can drain battery on mobile.

dragFigures.hint: Drag'n'drop for the figure list. Warning, if disabled and no initiative is required, there is no way to re-order the figures manually.

dragValues.hint: Drag support for changing values. To change initiative drag over the character portrait. For hit points, experience and loot drag over the values

eliteFirst.hint: Show elite standees first when ordering standees

errata.hint: Display known erratas for scenarios, sections, etc. In the data itself, all these errata should be fixed, but with the hints it should be easier to understand the differences in printing.

expireConditions.hint: Corresponding conditions will automatically removed after the figures turn, for example Strengthen will be removed after turn

fhGhItems.hint: Add Items from Gloomhaven and Forgotten Circles to available supply as stated out in the rules. (Only on enabled character sheets or character items)

fhStyle.hint: Display actions, abilities and icons in new Frosthaven style, automatically activates Frosthaven theme.

fontsize.hint: Set font size of ability and stats cards

gameClock.hint: Enable a game clock to track the time the app is running.

gameClockMerge.hint: Merge game clocks from server game with local game clock to get overall game time.

hideAbsent.hint: Absent figures are not shown in list

hideCharacterHP.hint: Do not display hit points on character board

hideCharacterLoot.hint: Do not display loot on character board

hideCharacterXP.hint: Do not display experience on character board

hideStats.hint: Hide stats of not spawned monster

hints.hint: Show shortcuts and hints next to the main menu

initiativeRequired.hint: If unchecked, the order of the entities must be set manually with drag&drop

interactiveAbilities.hint: Apply certain highlighted abilities, such as summons or elemental actions, directly by clicking on the appropriate area of the ability card.

Your browser doesn't seem to support IndexedDB or you have restricted usage. Therefore the max. number of undos is limited to 50.
hint.firefox: On Firefox you can enable IndexedDB for private mode in about:config with the key dom.indexedDB.privateBrowsing.enabled.

monsters.hint: If disabled no monsters are shown.

monsterAttackModifierDeck.hint: Enable the Attack Modifier Deck for monsters

moveElements.hint: The element state is automatically changed before each round

partySheet.hint: Enables Party- and Campaign Sheet. The campaign sheet is located on the backside of the party sheet.

portraitMode.hint: Optimization of Portrait-Mode for smaller screens.

pressDoubleClick.hint: On touchscreens, trigger double-click with long press instead. (Recommended to avoid ghost clicks)

randomStandees.hint: Add standees with an unused random number

removeUnusedMonster.hint: Automatically remove all unused monsters at end of round.

scenarioRewards.hint: Automatically apply treasure rewards: give gold, XP etc. to characters

scenarioRewardsItems.hint: Automatically draw a Random Item card.

scenarioRooms.hint: Unlocking of separate rooms in a scenario. If not set, also disables automatic adding of standees.

scenarioRules.hint: Show popup windows about special scenario rules and optional apply them

scenarioRulesAutoapply.hint: Directly apply automatic Scenario Rules without confirmation

showExpandedAbilityCard.hint: Show all abilities on ability cards at once (automatically also show card title).

showFullAbilityCard.hint: Show ability cards including card title.

sortFigures.hint: Automatically sort figures. If disabled, the order must be set manually via Drag'n'Drop.

standees.hint: Display standees. If disabled, unlocking rooms and automatic standees is also disabled.

standeeStats.hint: Show current %game.action.shield% and %game.action.retaliate% value next to every standee.

statAnimations.hint: Enable animation to highlight stats as %game.action.shield% or %game.action.retaliate%.

settings.synced: These settings are synchronised with the server!

theme.hint: Choose a theme for background, bars and fonts.

treasures.hint: Show available treasures for scenario when corresponding room is revealed and add dialog to open the treasure.

treasuresLoot.hint: Automatically apply treasure rewards: give gold, XP etc. to looting character, draw random side scenario or item design etc.

treasuresLootItem.hint: Automatically draw a Random Item card.

turnConfirmation.hint: Show a reminder when clicking "%round.next%" before all figures finished their turns. If disabled and %settings.expireConditions% or %settings.applyConditions% is active it will be automatically applied for all figures.

unlockEnvelopeBuildings.hint: Automatically unlock buildings by opening envelopes (from personal quest).

wakeLock.hint: Wake Lock on supported devices. Wake Lock will keep the screen on. This can drain battery on mobile.

battleGoals.drawCard: Draw another Battle Goal card for {0}

setup.addEdition: Add Battle Goal cards from edition %data.edition.{0}%

filter.addCard: Re-Add Battle Goal '{1}' (%data.edition.{0}%) to Battle Goal cards
filter.removeCard: Remove Battle Goal '{1}' (%data.edition.{0}%) from Battle Goal cards

setup.removeEdition: Remove Battle Goal cards from edition %data.edition.{0}%

info.changeMonsterType: Change type from {0} standee {2} from {1} to %monster.{3}%
info.donate: {0} donate to Sanctuary of the Great Oak

finishScenario.battleGoal: Set Battle Goal checkmarks for %data.character.{0}% to {1}

info.lootDeckShuffleUpcoming: Shuffle upcoming cards from Loot deck
info.setPQProgress: Set Personal Quest counter {1} to {2} for {0}
info.skipInteractiveActions: Skip interactive abilities for standees {1} of {2}
info.toggleTypeAll: Toggle all monster standee types for {0}

updateAttackModifierDeck.addCardShuffled: Shuffle new {1} card into {0} AM deck
updateAttackModifierDeck.removeDrawnDiscards: Remove drawn discards from {0} AM deck
updateAttackModifierDeck.shuffleUpcoming: Shuffle upcoming cards of {0} AM deck

reportIssue.mail: Please note that Microsoft wants to use its market power to block small, private e-mail servers. As a result, I can receive e-mails from outlook.com, hotmail.com or other Microsoft services, but I am not able reply to them!
reportIssue.specify:
Please specify details in text.
If you are unsure what's exactly the issue, please download and attach the data dump below!

feedback.hint: A general message to the developer.
feedback.subject: General Feedback

software.hint: A software bug, something not working as expected.
software.subject: Found Software Issue

notes.hint: e.g. special scenario rules like monster level adjustments, round events or HP calculations...

keyboard.am: Draw AM card (deck depending on active figure, monster deck when not active, disabled when Draw)
keyboard.amAdvantage: Same like m, but draw with Advantage if enabled
keyboard.amDisadvantage: like m, but draw with Disadvantage if enabled

On any open figure/standee menu, those shortcuts are disabled, currently shortcuts available in figure/standee menu:

keyboard.global: The following keyboard shortcuts are currently implemented:
keyboard.select: select figure/standee for opening menu with number key
keyboard.toggelTab: Toggle active figure when drawn / Toggle initiative input when focused input

welcome.chooseEdition: Start a new campaign by choosing your Edition:
welcome.orChooseCharacters: or start a casual game by adding characters directly

settings.text: Use various settings to set everything up appropriately:
